Sentencas: The main emphasis of this work is developing a 3D numerical model and investigating the performance characteristic of a direct ammonia fuelled protonic-conducting tubular solid oxide fuel cell (NH3-T-SOFC-H) in comparison with the corresponding hydrogen-fuelled one and direct ammonia feed oxygen-ion conducting tubular solid oxide fuel cell (NH3-T-SOFC-O) under the same operating parameters and geometrical shape.
Titulo: Numerical modelling and comparative analysis of direct ammonia fuelled protonic and oxygen- ion conducting tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The findings revealed that NH3-T-SOFC-H has outstanding performance over T-SOFC-O counterparts at intermediate temperature (973 K) when operated under similar working conditions and geometrical designs.
Titulo: Numerical modelling and comparative analysis of direct ammonia fuelled protonic and oxygen- ion conducting tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: On the other hand the NH3-T-SOFC-O is promising for higher operating temperatures.
Titulo: Numerical modelling and comparative analysis of direct ammonia fuelled protonic and oxygen- ion conducting tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The outcomes of the study are also confirmed that the power performance of NH3-AS-T-SOFC-O is better than the other supports of both electrolytes when the anode electrode is constructed at the outside portion of the tubular cell.
Titulo: Numerical modelling and comparative analysis of direct ammonia fuelled protonic and oxygen- ion conducting tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Yet, the other remarkable result found in this study is that NH3- CS- T-SOFC-O has outstanding performance compared to all supports of both electrolytes when the fuel electrode is built in the inner portion of the tube.
Titulo: Numerical modelling and comparative analysis of direct ammonia fuelled protonic and oxygen- ion conducting tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, the finding indicates that the power performance of ammonia-fuelled tubular cells is strongly influenced by the anode position, operating temperatures, and pressures in both electrolytes yet the effect of cell temperature is more influential in the protonic-conducting cell.
Titulo: Numerical modelling and comparative analysis of direct ammonia fuelled protonic and oxygen- ion conducting tubular solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It is also observed that the performance of ES-T-SOFC is lower than AS- and CS-T-SOFC in both electrolytes and anode positions.
Titulo: Numerical modelling and comparative analysis of direct ammonia fuelled protonic and oxygen- ion conducting tubular solid oxide fuel cell
